Package br.furb.inf.tcc.tankcoders.message

Class Summary
AbstractGameMessage Represents a base class of messages.
AllPlayersAreInGameState Message sent by game server to start battle in the clients.
AnotherPlayerChangeModelResponse Message sent by game server.
AnotherUserLogonRespose Message sent by game server.
ChangeModel Message sent to the game server when user change model of a tank.
ChangeTeam Message sent to the game server when user change team of a tank.
InvalidChangeTeamResponse Message sent by game server.
PlayerChangeTeamResponse Message sent by game server.
PlayerInBattle Message sent to the game server when the player change to ingame state.
PlayerLeftGame Message sent by game server to nofity that one player left game.
ServerIsAlive Message sent to the game server to check if it's alive.
StartBattle Message sent by game server to start battle in the clients.
SynchronizeArticulatedObject3DMessage Custom implementation of Synchronize3DMessage.
SynchronizeCreateTankMessage Custom implementation of SynchronizeCreateMessage used to register a local tank in the syncManager.
TankActionShotMachineGun Message sent to the game server when a tank shot machine gun bullet.
TankActionShotMainGun Message sent to the game server when a tank shot main gun bullet.
TankActionStopTurnMainGun Message sent to the game server when a tank stop of turn main gun.
TankActionTurnMainGun Message sent to the game server when a tank turn main gun.
TankBulletHit Message sent to the game server when a tank take a shot.
TankDead Message sent to the game server when a tank is dead.
TeamLeftGame Message sent by game server to nofity that one all team left game.
UserLogoff Message sent by server to nofity a user logoff.
UserLogon Message sent to the game server when user logon.
UserLogonFailedResponse Message sent by game server.
UserLogonRespose Message sent by game server.
UserReady Message sent to the game server when user mark as Ready.
UserUnready Message sent to the game server when user mark as Unready.
